venue.address_2: * Use Dirt Road on River Side*
venue.name: Curtis Park River Put In

item.description:
Yeh its last minut notice..so what...
This is an exploration trip..I dont know this part of the river, just saw it fron the parks' dirt road, looks like it might be worth a check out and looked like a good party spot. (just checking the viability of other nearby spots here too..the tariffvile gorge is nearby..etc)...
Also just looked at it from Google Earth..
I dont know how deep it is, where the pass not pass areas are..so for a few hours i want to check it out....
I dont want any bellyachers on this trip because im not sure of the location yet...just people interested in a explor trip..plastic boats preffered for exploring...

The location is called Curtis Park, socker, baseball fields and that kind of place, but on the river side there is a dirt road leading towards the river where there is a put in area..
Getting There:
from hartford direction:
91 north to exit 36,
Take left (west direction) on to 178 (park ave) toward bloomfield for 1.6 miles.
At intersection take right onto 187 (north direction) (blue hill ave) for about 5 miles heading toward tariffville direction.
You will meet 187/189 and a well paved portion of the road,
Stay on 189 to Tarriffville..at the end of the nice paved part you will end up in tariffville, take a left onto rte 315 (elm st) into Tarrifville road..for about 1.2 miles, take a right into Curtis Park and go to the river via the dirt road..

other info and map picture:
http://connecticut.qu...

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Kayak Exploration Trip near Tariffvill and Simsbury
